xwikidoc.title: 3. Store courses' Code value in courses objects
xwikidoc.content: {{info}}This migrations script applies to all the pages that have Courses objects. Courses codes are hard-coded in the Curriculum/MScCurriculum objects while they should belong to the course description pages, along with all the other properties. (!) Pay attention to Courses that use the same page for more than 1 entry (English I, English II -> create a new description page?) (!) This script depends on Course Overview migration, as it needs to read the desription page from objects{{/info}} {{velocity}} #macro (updateCodeProperty $class $template $execute) #set ($xClass = $xwiki.getClass($class)) #set ($statement = "from doc.object($class) as obj where doc.fullName <> '$template'") #set ($results = $services.query.xwql($statement).execute()) #foreach ($result in $results) #set ($document = $xwiki.getDocument($result)) #foreach ($prop in $xClass.properties) #if ($prop.type.equals('TextAreaClass')) #foreach ($line in $document.getValue($prop.name).split('\n')) #set ($lineParts = $line.split('\|')) #if ($lineParts.size() == 14) #set ($code = $lineParts[2].trim()) #if ($code != '') #set ($courseName = 'N/A') #set ($course = $lineParts[3].split('>>')) ## Courses like Sport, Optional 1 (withour information) #if (!$course[0].contains('[[')) #set ($courseTitle = $course[0]) #else #set ($courseTitle = $course[0].split('\[\[')) #if ($courseTitle.size() == 1) #set ($courseTitle = $courseTitle[0]) #else #set ($courseTitle = $courseTitle[1]) #set ($courseName = $course[1].split('\]\]')[0]) #end #end * $code: $courseTitle #if ($xwiki.exists($courseName)) #set ($courseDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($courseName)) #set ($courseDescriptionDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($courseDoc.getValue('courseDescription'))) ** [[$courseDescriptionDoc]] #if ($execute) #if ("$!courseDescriptionDoc.getValue('code')" == '') #set ($obj = $courseDescriptionDoc.getObject('Structure.Code.CourseClass')) #set ($discard = $obj.set('code', $code)) #set ($discard = $courseDescriptionDoc.save("Updated [Code] property to $code.")) #end #end #else ** ($courseName) #end #end #end #end #end #end #end #end #macro (execute $execute) #updateCodeProperty ('Structure.CurriculumClass', 'Structure.CurriculumTemplate', $execute) #updateCodeProperty ('Structure.MScCurriculumClass', 'Structure.MScCurriculumTemplate', $execute) #end #if ("$!request.simulate" == 'true') #execute(false) {{html clean="false"}}Start{{/html}} #elseif ("$!request.confirm" == 'true') #execute(true) #else {{html clean="false"}}Simulate{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
